DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the safety and efficacy of this antibody in rheumatoid arthritis patients. Part A of the study is an initial dose escalation phase Part B of the study is a randomized allocation of the entire dosing group to parallel treatment assignments
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Pharmacokinetics Study in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis regular use of methotrexate active rheumatoid arthritis Juvenile Rheumatoid Arthritis evidence of tuberculosis women who are pregnant or become pregnant during study, or are breastfeeding
